entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
